summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4477 for the improvement of 25th Avenue and 25th Avenue North, from East Union Street to East Madison Street, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52702, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
